column1: '''Mettarë''', meaning "Last-day", immediately preceded [[Yestarë]] and was the last day of the year in the calendars of the [[Elves]] and the [[Dúnedain]]. In the [[Reckoning of Rivendell
column2: Calendar of Imladris]], ''Mettarë'' fell more or less on [[5 April]] in the [[Shire Calendar]]. In the [[Kings' Reckoning]] and [[Stewards' Reckoning]] it corresponded with [[1 Yule]] in the Shire Calendar, around the winter solstice. In the [[New Reckoning]] it corresponded with [[24 March]] in the Shire Calendar.<ref>{{App
